Class LayoutsRowData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.common.swt.LayoutsRowData

  • public class LayoutsRowData
extends Object
    A fluent api for setting and modifying a RowData, created by Layouts. Inspired by Moritz Post's blog post..
